Stickit

A light weight Discussion platform with more focus on the php community.

Project Details

Project is meant to be simple and easy to use, it's a light weight Discussion platform with more focus on the php community, you can find answers to common questions here, mark best replies and filter Posts or threads with many criteria, notification is meant to be simple and following posts is just a click a way . stay toned for more features to come.
